H0.text: In the standard game of Monopoly, you go to jail if you throw how many consecutive sets of doubles on the dice. 2

H1.text: In the standard game of Monopoly, you go to jail if you throw how many consecutive sets of doubles on the dice. 4

H2.text: In the standard game of Monopoly, you go to jail if you throw how many consecutive sets of doubles on the dice. 5

H3.text: In the standard game of Monopoly, you go to jail if you throw how many consecutive sets of doubles on the dice. 3

A4.text: Rolling doubles allows a player to take another turn after moving their piece; however, if three consecutive doubles are rolled, the player is immediately sent to jail.

A5.text: A player lands in Jail by: ...Throwing three consecutive doubles in one turn
